titleStmt.title: The arte of warre, written first in Italia[n] by Nicholas Machiauell, and set forthe in Englishe by Peter Whitehorne, studient at Graies Inne: with an addicio[n] of other like marcialle feates and experimentes, and in a table in the ende of the booke maie appere
Arte della guerra. English
titleStmt.author: Machiavelli, Niccolò, 1469-1527.
Whitehorne, Peter.

publicationStmt.publisher: Anno. M.D.LX. Menss. [sic] Iulij. [Printed by John Kingston for] Niclas Inglande,

notesStmt.note: A translation of: Arte della guerra.

Colophon reads "Imprinted at London, by Ihon Kingston: for Nicolas Englande. Anno salutis, M.D.LXII. Mense. Aprilis". The publisher's name appears on the title page at the bottom of the woodcut frame.
"Certain waies for the orderyng of souldiers in battelray" has separate title page, foliation, and register.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
